item.title: Spring 2023 Harvard Map Collection
item.description: Collections and support services Historic maps of Havana in the Harvard Map Collection Global volcanoes dataset in the Harvard Geospatial Library (HGL). Workshops Mapping Inequality project via the University of Richmond’s Digital Scholarship Lab. Land-Grab Univerisities interactive digital project. Spring 2023 workshop offerings. Registration via the Harvard Library Events calendar . Office hours Map created by Luisa Shido. Tutorials and project examples Tutorials and blog . maps@harvard.edu https://library.harvard.edu/libraries/harvard-map-collection
